en: Are you sure you wish to unlock {0}?
Multiplier to base damage.\nMin: 0; Max: 2^31\nA skill's damage is calculated by the formula: Damage = base_damage * caster_power * skill_power * (1 - target_resilience).
Are you sure you wish to overwrite your existing save?
The click sfx that is played when dialogue is appearing
Delay between each letter, in seconds
The speed of the action animations in combat.\nDefault: 1.0x

How many times per second combat state is evaluated.
Higher values lead to more precise time-based calculations.
Reduce this if you're experiencing lag while time is running during combat.
Default: 40
Automatic: overlays will automatically fade out after the duration set in "Skill Overlay Duration".\nWait For Input: overlays will only fade out when you press to continue.
Nema is clearing the mist, she will get exhausted as time passes.

Nema is not clearing the mist, she won't get more exhausted but who knows what will happen to us...

This work of fiction contains content of a sexual nature and is inappropriate for minors. All characters depicted are at least 21 years old. Everything is consensual role play and any animals are actually people in costumes. \n \nIf you are under 21 years of age please close this application immediately, you may do so by pressing the "Esc" key.
This build is a demo; many of the systems are likely going to change as development progresses. \n \nConsider checking out the "Planned Features" section on the main menu.
Thank you to all the supporters who have helped making this game a reality!
Chance for skills cast by this character to succesfully hit enemies.\nFinal chance to hit is calculated by the formula: caster_accuracy + skill_accuracy - target_dodge.

Base value for calculating damage dealt with skills that can deal damage.\nMin: 0; Max: 2^31\nA skill's damage is calculated by the formula: Damage = base_damage * caster_power * skill_power * (1 - target_resilience).

Chance to score critical hits, which applies the following modifiers to the skill cast:
<line-indent=10%>Damage dealt is set to 1.5x of the character's upper damage threshold.
Effects have a +50 chance to be applied.
Effects are stronger or last longer.</line-indent>

Final chance to crit is calculated by the formula: caster_critical.chance + skill_critical.chance.

Flat reduction(or increase, if negative) to the chance of being hit by skills that enemies cast.\nThere are exceptions, some skills cannot be dodged.\nFinal chance to hit is calculated by the formula: caster_accuracy + skill_accuracy - target_dodge.

Flat reduction(or increase, if negative) to the chance of enemies applying Debuffs to this character.\nCannot resist Debuffs applied by allies or self.\nFinal chance for a Debuff to be applied is calculated by the formula: caster_debuff.apply.chance + skill_debuff.apply.chance - target_debuff.resistance.

Flat increase(or decrease, if negative) to the chance of this character applying Debuffs on enemies.\nApplying Debuffs on allies or self always has 100 chance.\nFinal chance for a Debuff to be applied is calculated by the formula: caster_debuff.apply.chance + skill_debuff.apply.chance - target_debuff.resistance.

Flat reduction(or increase, if negative) to the chance of enemies changing the Position of this character.\nCannot resist moving through skills cast by allies or self.\nFinal chance for success is calculated by the formula: caster_move.apply.chance + skill_move.apply.chance - target_move.resistance.

Flat increase(or decrease, if negative) to the chance of this character changing the Position of enemies.\Moving through skills cast by allies or self always has 100 chance.\nFinal chance for success is calculated by the formula: caster_move.apply.chance + skill_move.apply.chance - target_move.resistance.

Flat reduction(or increase, if negative) to the chance of enemies applying Poison on this character.\nCannot resist Poison applied by allies or self.\nFinal chance for a Poison to be applied is calculated by the formula: caster_poison.apply.chance + skill_poison.apply.chance - target_poison.resistance.

Flat increase(or decrease, if negative) to the chance of this character applying Poison on enemies.\nApplying Poison on allies or self always has 100 chance.\nFinal chance for a Poison to be applied is calculated by the formula: caster_poison.apply.chance + skill_poison.apply.chance - target_poison.resistance.

Flat increase(or decrease, if negative) to the chance of this character applying Arousal on enemies.\nApplying Arousal on allies or self always has 100 chance.\nFinal chance for Arousal to be applied is calculated by the formula: caster_arousal.apply.chance + skill_arousal.apply.chance.

The maximum number of times the character can orgasm before being unable to continue fighting.\nCan be restored by resting at campfires.\nIf the party wins despite a character reaching their limit, that character's orgasm count will be reduced by 1. (Thus always allowing them to participate on the next fight.)

How many times the character has orgasmed, reaching the limit will render the character unable to fight.\nCan be reduced by resting at campfires.\nIf the party wins despite a character reaching their limit, that character's orgasm count will be reduced by 1. (Thus allowing them to always participate on the next fight)

Defense against Temptation effects, reduces Temptation received from enemies, will completely deny Temptations with Power less than this character's Composure. An enemy skill's Temptation Power increases based on this character's lust. \nMin: -100; Max: 300
Knowledge, Wisdom, anything that can be remembered.
How horny the character is, affects Temptation received by skills that increase Temptation.\nA character will orgasm if they reach 200 lust while having sex.
How fast this character can Charge and Recover from skills. The Charge and Recovery times displayed on the skill's tooltip assumes a normal speed of 100.\nMin: 20; Max: 300

How much damage this character can receive before being downed. This amount is restored after each combat.\nWhen a character is Downed they will be vulnerable, receiving a -40 debuff to Composure and being unable to cast skills. Downed characters will get back up after a while.
Percentage reduction(or increase, if negative) to Stamina damage received from skills cast by enemies.\nMin: -100; Max: 100

Defense against Stun effects, reduces the duration and will completely deny Stuns with Power less than this character's mitigation.\nMin: -100; Max: 300\n A Stun with Power 100 against a character with 0 Mitigation will result in 1 second of Stun. The formula is not linear and it favors Mitigation, 100 Power vs 50 Mitigation ~= 0.4s of Stun.
How close this character is of succumbing to Desire.\nBeing Tempted at 100 will lead to [REDACTED].
